channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Kelsey Chen

item.title: Html tags in .md files not working
item.description: Introduction Since Hugo version 0.60, the default Markdown renderer has been changed to goldmark. In goldmark, the default is not to render raw HTML tags. So, You may has some promble like this : If you need use html tags, please follow me: Let’s Start ! Step 1. Modify config.toml You don’t need install any packages. Just add below Msg in config.

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: ENV : OS : Ubuntu 18.04 Desktop Hugo : v0.93.0 What is Hugo ? Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again. Note More Hugo introduction, please see hugo website. Hugo has many installation methods, including Windows/macOS/Linux. Now, we will show you how to install in Linux. Please Follow the following steps:
